document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2012-02
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON, CALIFORNIA, AMENDING TITLE 15, CHAPTERS 15.08 AND 15.12 OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE, TO AUTHORIZE THE CITY COUNCIL TO AMEND THE TIMING FOR PAYMENT OF DEVELOPMENT OR MITIGATION IMPACT FEES, OTHER THAN SEWER AND WATER FEES
